page.title: 12Guiding in Purley
page.content: Every Friday from 6-8pm I go to Guides. The meetings are held at St.Davids, Purley, which happens to be my school, but any girl can join as long as they are in the age limit of 10-14. All guides wear the same uniform, a light blue blouse and navy skirt with a special belt and purse. Every different Company wears a coloured scarf. As I belong to the 6th.Purley Company I wear a yellow scarf. Also at guides we go to camp each year. Guides were founded by Lady Baden Powell whose birthday we celebrate on February 22nd and it is called 'Thinking Day'. 1985 is the 75th. anniversary of guiding. We are holding a party and competitions called 'Space 75' at Thomas More School.
